title: downloading game error 004 start again
body: I have reinstalled the game twice, tried setting permission as admin, used hex repair tool, (done the repair and reinstall), used the launchers repair, no dice. works on my other computer, tried copying it from that machine to this one, still no dice. I am open to suggestions.

replies.body: Have you tried the following specific settings: http://techcords.com/fix-league-of-legends-error-code-004/
